CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( DMAPP__Is_Actions_Ever_Planned__c ) , 'Blank', IF( (DMAPP__Min_Due_Date_All_Tasks__c >= TODAY()), 'Yes', IF( OR(AND(ISNULL(DMAPP__Min_Due_Date_All_Tasks__c),ISNULL(DMAPP__Max_Due_Date_All_Tasks__c)),OR((DMAPP__Min_Due_Date_All_Tasks__c < TODAY() - 3), (DMAPP__Max_Due_Date_All_Tasks__c < TODAY()))), 'No', IF( AND((DMAPP__Min_Due_Date_All_Tasks__c < TODAY()), (DMAPP__Min_Due_Date_All_Tasks__c >= (TODAY() - 3))), IF(DMAPP__Max_Due_Date_All_Tasks__c >= TODAY(), 'Unknown', 'Blank'), 'Blank' ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ACTIONS: Do you have planned actions in place?
CustomField.label: PlanSignal Actions
